title: visualizing feature maps using tensorboard?
body_html:
After following the tensorboard intro guides and looking at the tensorboard data produced from the cifar example, I'm also wondering if tensorboard allows you to display feature maps like this:

http://neuralnetworksanddeeplearning.com/images/net_full_layer_0.png
